mapper.select: SELECT id, category_id AS categoryId, item_type AS itemType, title, sell_point AS sellPoint, price, num, barcode AS barCode, image, status, priority, created_time AS createdTime, modified_time AS modifiedTime, created_user AS createdUser, modified_user AS modifiedUser FROM t_goods WHERE category_id = #{categoryId} AND status = 1 AND num > 0 ORDER BY ${orderBy} LIMIT #{offset}, #{count}
